instruction: Assemble a toy robot according to the given instructions.
input:
Instructions: Tip: Make sure to read the instructions and familiarize yourself with all the pieces before beginning.

<noinput>
output:
Step 1: Begin by inserting the two wires into the back of the robot’s head, checking to make sure the connections are secure.

Step 2: Attach the torso plate to the back of the head plate. Secure the plate with four screws. 

Step 3: Place the arms and legs onto the body of the robot, making sure the joints are lined up. Secure the pieces together by inserting the included bolts and fasteners.

Step 4: Connect the wheels to the robot’s feet. Secure the wheels to the robot’s feet with the included screws. 

Step 5: Insert the battery pack into the back of the robot, attaching the metal connector to the actual robot battery. Make sure the connection is tight and secure.

Step 6: Place the last two pieces – the robot’s eyes – into the robot’s head. Make sure the pieces fit securely before continuing. 

Step 7: Power up the robot by pressing the power switch.

Congratulations! You have successfully assembled your robot. Enjoy your new robot!
